name: Crused_Field Horror Game
description:
Cursed field horror game for pc

The story tells of a young farmer who has a house and a field. One day, the dog begins to bark at something in the field. The dog enters the field, and the young man follows him, looking for his dog in the middle of the field.

But when he tries to get out of the field, he finds himself in a maze that he cannot get out of

  He starts hearing and seeing strange things.

Average Gameplay Time: 10-15 minutes

If you have heart disease, please avoid playing this game.

If you like the game and would like to support the development of upcoming projects, consider making a donation via this site. I appreciate all the support.

note. For the best experience, it is recommended to wear headphones.
